Define Documentation

#define data_convert (   _ret,
  _type,
  _dst,
  _src 
)
Value:
{                                          \
        data_t __data_dst = { _type, REF_##_type(_dst) };                                \
        fastcall_convert_from _r_convert = { { 3, ACTION_CONVERT_FROM }, _src };         \
        _ret = data_query(&__data_dst, &_r_convert);                                     \
        _dst = DEREF_##_type(&__data_dst);                                               \
        (void)_ret;                                                                      \
};

Convert value from holder to buffer. If destination data

Parameters:
_retReturn value (ssize_t)
_typeDestination data type. Only constants allowed.
_dstDestination data.
_srcSource data holder.
Return values:
0Convertation successfull.
<0Convertation failed.
#define data_get (   _ret,
  _type,
  _dt,
  _src 
)
Value:
{                                         \
        if((_src) != NULL && (_src)->type == _type){                           \
                _dt  = DEREF_##_type(_src);                                    \
                _ret = 0;                                                      \
        }else{                                                                 \
                if( HAVEBUFF_##_type == 1 ){                                   \
                        data_convert(_ret, _type, _dt, _src);                  \
                }else{                                                         \
                        _ret = -EINVAL;                                        \
                }                                                              \
        }                                                                      \
        (void)_ret;                                                            \
}

Read value from holder to supplied buffer

Parameters:
_retReturn value (ssize_t)
_typeDestination data type: one of TYPE_*. Only constants allowed
_dtDestination data. (uintmax_t for TYPE_UINTT, char * for TYPE_STRINGT, etc)
_srcSource data holder (data_t *)
Return values:
-EINVALInvalid source, or convertation error
0Operation successfull

Call action on data
